item.title: Using GC.KeepAlive in async methods
item.description: GC.KeepAlive may not work the way you intend when using it in async methods.

item.description: This article explains how AsyncLocal values are stored inÂ .NET and how to retrieve them from a memory dump.

item.title: .NET ThreadPool starvation, and how queuing makes it worse
item.description: Explaining the ThreadPool starvation issue, and how it can be made worse by the way work-items are queued.

item.title: Switching back to the UI thread in WPF/UWP, in modern C#
item.description: Leveraging the async machinery to transparently switch to the UI thread when needed.
